mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, blue and black on white) announcing a free Country and Gospel Music Show with Kirk McGee, Blythe Poteete, the Fox Brothers, Cowboy Joe Babcock and the Stillhouse Reelers in Franklin on July 9. Poster features metal photoplates of Kirk McGee, the Fox Brothers, and Cowboy Joe Babcock. Poster was printed for job no. 0217. For additional information about this order see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20940.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
